      • canSetSuperUser

        public static boolean canSetSuperUser(User user)
        Parameters:
        user - => The user currently attempting to promote another user to SuperUser status
        Returns:
        true if user is a SuperUser; false otherwise

      • canUnlockProfile

        public static boolean canUnlockProfile(User user)
        Parameters:
        user - => The user currently attempting to lock/unlock an account
        Returns:
        true if user is a superuser; false otherwise

      • canAssignRole

        public static boolean canAssignRole(Sale sale,
                                    User user)
        Parameters:
        sale - => The Sale to which a User is trying to add a new User
        user - => The User trying to add a new User to the sale NOTE: user is NOT the person we are trying to add. user is ALREADY part of the sale
        Returns:
        true if user is SuperUser or Sale Admin; false otherwise
